attributes.action: Bring back the death sentence in England
attributes.additional_details: Why should we let Rapists, Mass murderers and child killers etc. in prison when they deserve death. We people have suffered mentally and physically. If we brought the death sentence back. We would feel safer leaving are homes and knowing are family is safe. After all would you let a killer who has killed a classroom full of infants live? When they could of been the next generation and developing our society. Or a person who have raped and killed women and children then killing them would you let them live knowing what they done to victims who will never forget the past. There's one solution the death penalty
